html: Today, the House voted to make tax cuts at every level permanent and lock in tax relief for small businesses, which will provide certainty and support long-term growth.

html: Now, less than a year after tax reform was signed into law, our economy is booming- unemployment is at a record low, consumer and small business confidence are at historic highs, and wages are growing at their fastest pace in nearly a decade.

SCDOT will begin removing flood related debris from roadsides in five counties beginning the week of Monday, October 1st. 

The counties where roadside debris will be collected are:

* 𝐃𝐢𝐥𝐥𝐨𝐧
* 𝐆𝐞𝐨𝐫𝐠𝐞𝐭𝐨𝐰𝐧
* 𝐇𝐨𝐫𝐫𝐲
* 𝐌𝐚𝐫𝐢𝐨𝐧
